intro: Bulbophyllum makoyanum, commonly known as the Makoyanum orchid, is a species of epiphytic orchid native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its compact growth habit and produces clusters of small, fragrant flowers in shades of white and pink. The plant typically grows on tree trunks or branches, relying on its aerial roots for moisture and nutrients.
